channel.description: CIS 527 Lab 1 - Ubuntu Processes & Services Processes & Services Process - A Program Running in the Foreground for the User Service - A Program Running in the Background for the Operating System Managing Processes System Monitor top and htop ps, pstree, kill, and pkill glances saidar Daemon Traditional Name for Linux Services From Greek Mythology Process Names Typically End in 'd' Managed by systemd on Ubuntu Use "systemctl" Command to Interact
